name: Brik-Bat
overview: Brik-Bat is a horizontal Pong/Breakout hybrid, in which one player versus the computer or two players bounce the ball into the center of the screen to destroy bricks. In addition to the standard miss causing a lost life, each player also has a "shot" from their paddle that can blow up the opponents paddle. The game includes an editor that allows users to create their own brick pattern levels to play.
